example.text: Because of the legend of Liu Hai teasing the golden toad, toads became auspicious symbols revered * throughout China ever since the Eastern Han dynasty -LRB- AD 25-220 -RRB-

predicate.note: Frames file for 'revere' based on entry for 'admire'. Verbnet entry 31.2, other members include admire, adore, cherish, distrust, envy, favor, grudge, loathe, pity, relish, savor, tolerate, value, and worship. Framenet entry Judgement.
